verbs.description: [ARG0: top brands] [V: fight] [ARG0: china e - commerce giant a u s clothing company that was expecting a 20 percent jump in online sales on alibaba tmall] saw sales plummet 10 to 20 percent after the company refused to sign an exclusive contract with alibaba instead participating in a promotion with archrival jd com jdcom china tmall
